page.title: 04 BRERETON MENU
page.content: FIRST MEAL Cereal with Pasteurised Milk and 2 Spoonsful of Sugar, 2 Slices of Toast with Butter, Jam or Marmalade. Cup of Tea or Coffee with Milk and Sugar. MID-MORNING SNACK Flavoured Crisps or Chocolate Biscuits. SECOND MEAL Sandwiches,Soup, Flavoured Crisps, Biscuits or Cake, Cup of Tea or Glass of Pop. MID-AFTERNOON SNACK Sweets or Chocolate THIRD MEAL Chips, Egg Bakedbeans Beef or Cheeseburger, Tomato and Brown Sauce, Vinegar,Salad Cream, Salt. Apple Crumble with Custard. Glass of Pop. FOURTH MEAL Cereal with Pasteurised Milk and 2 spoonsful of sugar. Cup of Tea or Chocolate. Plus Sweets/Chocolate through the day.
